#Read in the cars.csv file and use the col_types() function to ensure you load in:
```{r}
cars <- read.csv(
  "data/cars.csv", 
  col_types = cols(
    x1 = col_character(),
    mpg = col_double(),
    cyl = col_double(),
    disp = col_double(),
    hp = col_double(),
    vs = col_logical()
    )
)
```

#Read in the scotland.txt file using the appropriate function.

scotland
